DataElement.preferredName: Patient Hyperthyroidism Assay Personal Medical History Date
DataElement.preferredDefinition: the date of the most recent lab value indicating hyperthyroidism.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Hyperthyroidism Assay Personal Medical History
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information relating to a patient's personal medical history (an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced) and an assay (the determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture) for hyperthyroidism (excessive functional activity of the thyroid gland).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: Excessive functional activity of the thyroid gland.:The determination of the amount of a particular constituent of a mixture or of the biological or pharmacological potency of a drug.:an account of all medical events and problems a person has experienced.

Concepts.definition: Overactivity of the thyroid gland resulting in overproduction of thyroid hormone and increased metabolic rate. Causes include diffuse hyperplasia of the thyroid gland (Graves' disease), single nodule in the thyroid gland, and thyroiditis. The symptoms are related to the increased metabolic rate and include weight loss, fatigue, heat intolerance, excessive sweating, diarrhea, tachycardia, insomnia, muscle weakness, and tremor.
A qualitative or quantitative analysis performed to determine the amount of a particular constituent in a sample or the biological or pharmacological properties of a drug.
A record of a patient's background regarding health and the occurrence of disease events of the individual. In addition, personal medical history may be a variable in epidemiologic studies.

ConceptualDomain.preferredName: Chronic or Associated Diseases and Exposures
ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: chronic diseases, as well as diseases and exposures associated with cancer.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The date on which an observation was made or an event occurred.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: a particular day specified as the time something has, or will, happen.

Concepts.definition: The particular day, month and year an event has happened or will happen.

ValueDomain.changeDescription: 8/3/17 tt added Diagnosis CSI. 6/20/17 jk transferred to NCI Standards per confirmation by Brian Campbell as part of Round 5 finalization task, added reg status.
